name: 周素鳳
objective: In this semester, we’ll move from the personal, subjective to the objective, critical; from close observations to the critical process and argumentation.  Project I involves writing an argumentative essay on educational or social issues.  Students will be guided with strategies of critical reading and reasoning so as to set forth critical responses and formulate solid arguments with sturdy evidences and strong reasoning. Project II—Reading the News—emphasizes analysis and critique.  After carefully examining two newspaper articles describing the similar event or issue, students will learn to read critically and write structured analysis essays.
